title: [安全][TDO]StickyLocks —— 棍子锁,用棍子锁住一个方块![1.7.x|1.9]
author: hahahahah
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-16 20:44 编辑 




简介:
玩家可以手拿一个棍子,右击一个可以被保护的方块然后单击可以锁定这个方块的主人,当这名玩家再次右击并且单击一个可以被保护的方块就可以解除这个方块的主人,
要用到UUID,所以1.7以下的服务器就不用看了


装了这个用棍子就不能破坏方块了

This plugin does not prevent destruction of any of the protected blocks.这个插件不会阻止任何被保护的方块被毁坏

当然可以用这个插件防止被保护的方块毁坏


安装:下载这个插件,吧.jar文件放到plugin文件夹,启动服务器,没了


权限:


stickylocks.lock允许玩家锁定方块并且添加谁可以使用方块stickylocks.locksmith允许玩家修改别人锁定的方块stickylocks.ghost permits a user to open or use blocks that would otherwise be locked by the plugin (这个看不懂)stickylocks.reload重载插件 的权限



指令:



/sl show  显示被选定方块的状态/sl add <player|group> 添加可用锁定物品的玩家或组/sl remove <player|group> 移除可用锁定物品的玩家或组/sl group <group> 列出一个组的成员/sl group <group> add <player> 添加一个成员到一个组/sl group <group> remove <player> 从一个组中移除一个成员/sl group <group> {rename|merge} <name> 重命名一个组/sl clearselection 清除选定/sl reload重载插件


非常有诚意的配置文件:



protectables   允许被保护的方块的名称


tools 默认选择方块的材料  初始值是棍子,如果换成其他棍子就不能锁定解锁方块了,
chatprefix 这个插件句子的前缀



下载地址:





1.7.4-1.7.2


1.7.9-R0.2

1.9





没人看的更新日志:



beta 0.9
Now depends on 1.9 APICross-world vulnerability removed


beta 0.7
Existing offline players are added to the database when the plugin starts for the first timeProtection of locked inventories from hoppersDouble chests are no longer handled erratically, and can be placed, broken to single and rebuilt without losing lock dataNew strings added to config file in anticipation of the 1.8 API



beta 0.4
Some refactoring of codeRemoval of project files from source repoRemoval of dependencies on other pluginsRemoved explicit integration of other plugins in favour of a heuristic approach to detecting block protection (making a fake block break event and see if anything cancels it)Added BURNING_FURNACE to the default config, so that furnaces stay protected when lit Thanks to Lee Watson (TheReverend403) for help with cleaning up my packaging

beta 0.2
Fixed an annoyance where the plugin would select any block, not just those it was meant to protect.Added /sl clearselection - it seems that in some versions of Minecraft, right-clicking air does nothing.





beta 0.1


This is the initial published release.




快来丢人气金币 砸死我把
